abstract: Dennis Cuneo, a former adviser to Toyota, has joined the Casesa Shapiro Group, an investment and analysis firm with deep roots in the automobile industry.
snippet: Dennis Cuneo, a former adviser to Toyota, has joined the Casesa Shapiro Group, an investment and analysis firm with deep roots in the automobile industry.
lead_paragraph: From Micheline Maynard, a DealBook colleague

headline.main: Toyota Adviser Joins Casesa Shapiro Group
